text: Isaac Slade (born May 26, 1981) is an American singer-songwriter. He is a member of the rock band called The Fray. He has released several albums with the band The Fray including How to Save a Life and Live at the Electric Factory. He records and performs more of a piano rock and acoustic. Singles include "How to Save a Life", "Look After You", and "Cable Car". title: Isaac Slade
